short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert mobile links to desktop ones

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Convert mobile links to regular ones on whatsapp web.

When someone sends a link to a mobile site, in desktop it displayed in an inconvenient way, this extension automatically changes that to a desktop site.
